2.1. api.adapter.mano.cisconfv¶

Bases: object

This function does not have a direct mapping in Cisco NFV client so it will just return the status of the VNF with given ID.

This function does not have a direct mapping in OpenStack Tacker client so it will just return the status of a group of VNF instance IDs.
